import axios from"axios";// endpoint from googlebooks api
var BaseUrl="https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=";export default{// calls googlbooks api and retrieve books based on user input
searchBooks:function searchBooks(query){return axios.get(BaseUrl+query);},// get all books saved in db
getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},// saves a book to the db
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);},// deletes a book with the given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("api/books/"+id);}};
